Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state C,$P_{c}=5	imes10^{5}P_{a}$ and $V_{c}=2	imes10^{-3}m^{3}$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state A,$P_{A}=3	imes10^{5}P_{a}$ and $V_{A}=3	imes10^{-3}m^{3}$
According to the ideal gas equation of state $ rac{P_{A}V_{A}}{T_{A}}= rac{P_{C}V_{C}}{T_{C}}$, $T_{A}=450k$ can be obtained
